SEARCH
Package com.retriage.retriage.services

Interface EventService

All Known Implementing Classes:
EventServiceImp
public interface EventService
Service interface defining the contract for managing Event entities. Implementations of this interface handle the business logic related to events, including creation, retrieval, updating, deletion, and managing the active event state.

  • Method Details

    • saveEvent

      boolean saveEvent(Event event)
      Saves a given Event entity.
      Parameters:
      event - The Event to save.
      Returns:
      true if the event was saved successfully, false otherwise.

    • findEventById

      Event findEventById(Long id)
      Finds an Event entity by its unique identifier.
      Parameters:
      id - The unique ID of the event to find.
      Returns:
      The Event entity if found, otherwise null.

    • updateEvent

      Event updateEvent(long id, Event event)
      Updates an existing Event entity with new data.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the event to update.
      event - The Event object containing the updated data.
      Returns:
      The updated Event entity.

    • findAllEvents

      List<Event> findAllEvents()
      Retrieves all existing Event entities.
      Returns:
      A List of all Event entities. Returns an empty list if no events exist.

    • deleteEventById

      void deleteEventById(Long id)
      Deletes an Event entity by its unique identifier.
      Parameters:
      id - The unique ID of the event to delete.

    • findActiveEvent

      Event findActiveEvent()
      Finds the currently active Event. The criteria for an "active" event are determined by the service implementation.
      Returns:
      The active Event entity if one exists, otherwise null.

    • resetEventById

      Event resetEventById(Event event)
      Resets the state of a given Event entity. This typically involves setting its status back to Created and potentially clearing related progress data.
      Parameters:
      event - The Event entity to reset.
      Returns:
      The reset Event entity.
